title: How to Cook Korean Spicy Boiled Rice Cake

steps.headline: In a large pan, put water, red pepper sauce and sugar.
Put minced garlic, chopped onion, chopped green onion and some vegetables and boil for 5 minutes.
Put sticky rice and tempura and boil for 3 minutes.
Put soy sauce and boil for 2 minutes

text: In a large pan, put water, red pepper sauce and sugar. Mix and boil for 5 minutes. Put minced garlic, chopped onion, chopped green onion and some vegetables and boil for 5 minutes.  Put sticky rice and tempura and boil for 3 minutes.  Put soy sauce and boil for 2 minutes  Enjoy eating.
